enumChoice.choice: Outputs are pulsed (OpSw1=t)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Outputs are static (OpSw1=c)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

variable.comment: Pulse or Blink rate - needs expansion to four bits!

enumChoice.choice: Outputs pulse active or blink for 0.1 second (OpSw2=t)
Outputs pulse active or blink for 0.2 second (OpSw2=c)

variable.comment: Pulse or Blink rate - needs expansion to four bits!

enumChoice.choice: Add 0 seconds to the pulse or blink rate (OpSw3=t)
Add 0.3 seconds to the pulse or blink rate (OpSw3=c)

variable.comment: Pulse or Blink rate - needs expansion to four bits!

enumChoice.choice: Add 0 seconds to the pulse or blink rate (OpSw4=t)
Add 0.7 seconds to the pulse or blink rate (OpSw4=c)

variable.comment: Pulse or Blink rate - needs expansion to four bits!

enumChoice.choice: Add 0 seconds to the pulse or blink rate (OpSw5=t)
Add 1.5 seconds to the pulse or blink rate (OpSw5=c)
Outputs automatically power-up to the last known state (OpSw6=t)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Each output remain undriven until its turnout command is received (OpSw6=c)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Short delay for interrogation requests (OpSw8=t)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Long delay for interrogation requests (OpSw8=c)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Static Outputs remain powered (OpSw9=t)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Static Outputs are shut off after 16 seconds (OpSw9=c)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Throttle and Computer commands are accepted (OpSw10=t)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Computer commands are accepted (OpSw10=c)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Routes are triggered by Switch commands from Computers or Throttles (OpSw11=t)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Routes are triggered by DS64 inputs (OpSw11=c)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: S inputs affect output; A inputs send Sensor messages (OpSw12=t)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: A input high forces output "Thrown"; S input high forces output "Closed" (OpSw12 = c)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Inputs have no effect (OpSw13=t)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Inputs act as LocoNet Sensors and also control related outputs per OpSw12 (OpSw13=c)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Accepts commands from LocoNet messages and Track (OpSw14=t)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Accepts commands from Track only (OpSw14=c)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Inputs can control outputs (OpSw15=t)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Inputs have no direct effect on outputs (OpSw15=c)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Routes are enabled (OpSw16=t)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Routes are disabled (OpSw16=c)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Output 1 does not provide "crossing-gate" output (OpSw17=t)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Output 1 provides "crossing-gate" output (OpSw17=c)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Output 2 does not provide "crossing-gate" output (OpSw18=t)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Output 2 provides "crossing-gate" output (OpSw18=c)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Output 3 does not provide "crossing-gate" output (OpSw19=t)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Output 3 provides "crossing-gate" output (OpSw19=c)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Output 4 does not provide "crossing-gate" output (OpSw20=t)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Output 4 provides "crossing-gate" output (OpSw20=c)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Inputs generate LocoNet "General Sensor" messages (OpSw21=t)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice

enumChoice.choice: Inputs generate LocoNet "LocoNet Turnout State" messages (OpSw21=c)
enumChoice.comment: Thrown is first choice; Closed is second choice
